title: Motion of balloon relative to the ground

content.question: A balloon of mass M is floating motionless in the air. A person of mass less than M is on a rope ladder hanging from the balloon. The person begins to climb the ladder at a uniform speed v relative to the ground. How does the balloon move relative to the ground?

choices.label: Up with a speed less than v
Down with a speed less than v

content.answer: Down with a speed less than v

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
